remarks: The projection on a subspace sum is the sum of the projections. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2000.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjsumt.1 $e |- G e. CH $.
pjsumt.2 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjsumi $p |- ( A e. ~H -> ( G C_ ( _|_ ` H ) -> ( ( projh ` ( G +H H ) ) ` A ) = ( ( ( projh ` G ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) ) ) ) $.
